function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of COVID-19 safety measures in conservation areas","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission within local communities and visitors","Mitigation":"Implementing and enforcing COVID-19 safety measures, including hand sanitizer and social distancing, in conservation areas","Technologies":"COVID-19 testing and contact tracing technology","People":"Local communities, tourists, conservation workers","Owner":"Conservation organizations, government, tourism businesses"},{"Description":"Inadequate engagement of local communities in conservation efforts","Impact":"Loss of potential economic and socio-economic benefits for local communities","Mitigation":"Involving local communities in decision-making and benefit-sharing arrangements, implementing shared-governance arrangements for PCAs","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, participatory decision-making tools","People":"Local communities, conservation organizations, government","Owner":"Conservation organizations, government, local community leaders"},{"Description":"Limited private capital investment in conservation finance","Impact":"Reduced funding for conservation projects and initiatives","Mitigation":"Engaging the finance sector, attracting private capital, and demonstrating the financial viability of conservation projects","Technologies":"Investment and finance platforms, impact measurement tools","People":"Finance sector, conservation organizations","Owner":"Conservation organizations, finance sector"}]}
